mapper.sql: id, user_name, user_phone, user_login_id, user_type, acction_name, class_name, method_name, url, request, response, client_ip, server_ip, version, system, model, state, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
select
from request_log where 1=1
and user_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userName}),'%')
and user_phone like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userPhone}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into request_log (id, user_name, user_phone, user_login_id, user_type, acction_name, class_name, method_name, url, request, response, client_ip, server_ip, version, system, model, state, createtime, updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLoginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acctionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{response,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{system,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
